## Using fishbot_download()

Included in this package is a function that connects to the ERDDAP server and 
downloads data at user-specified temporal and spatial scales. This function 
takes in a start and end date as well as the EPU of interest (GOM, GB, MAB).

`fishbot_download()` returns a dataframe which includes all 
available variables (time, temperature, temperature min/max and standard
deviation, number of temperature observations, depth, latitude and
longitude)

```
fishbot_download(
   EPU = 'GOM',
   startDate = '2023-08-01',
   endDate = '2023-08-31'
  )

#Plot series with trend 
ggplot2::ggplot(data = data,aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_gls()
```
